code.name: Su3Xpython
code.content:
n=1000
	S=0
	for i in range(n):
	u = rand()
	S= S + sqrt(-2*log(1-u))
	print("Valeur approchée de I = ")
	print(S/n)
code.html:
PYTHON Su3Xpython 
n=1000
	S=0
	for i in range(n):
	u = rand()
	S= S + sqrt(-2*log(1-u))
	print("Valeur approchée de I = ")
	print(S/n)
